name: ProductAlternate
description: Contains information about alternative products, including type of alternative.

fields.name: site_id
fields.description: Site ID incase alternate is specific by site

fields.name: alternate_type
fields.description: Type of alternate product. E.g. "Similar_Demand_Product" to identify similar product that is used to generate forecast; other values are "Substitute", "NPI Similar", "Promo Similar".   Applications can list their own supported values.Â Usage is defined based on application logic.

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the data source (i.e. connection). Auto populated by ASC.

fields.name: alternate_group_id
fields.description: Used to group interchangeable alternate products.  Note: does not correspond to product_group in product_hierarchy.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of alternate product record. E.g. Active, Inactive

fields.name: alternate_product_qty
fields.description: Quantity of alternate product. The conversion is done per base_UOM of primary product.

fields.name: alternate_product_qty_uom
fields.description: Unit of measure (UOM) of alternative product quantity

fields.name: eff_end_date
fields.description: Date-time till when record is effective

fields.name: db_creation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was created

fields.name: db_updation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was last updated
